00063 
00064 #ifdef LINUX
00065 void  *thread_fn(void *inp_arg)
00066 #else
00067 unsigned _stdcall thread_fn(void *inp_arg)
00068 #endif
00069 {
00070 int thread_no,plugin_init_state,iResult;
00071 GENERIC_PLUGIN *plugin_p,*plugin_inp;
00072 SOCKET clnt_sock,nfds;
00073 fd_set socks;
00074 generic_server *fwork = generic_server::pinstance;
00075 ostringstream oss;
00076     fwork->rel_thread_sync_mutex();
00077     try
00078     {
00079         plugin_inp = dynamic_cast<GENERIC_PLUGIN *>((GENERIC_PLUGIN *)inp_arg);
00080         plugin_p = (fwork->factory[plugin_inp->get_plugin()])();
00081         *plugin_p = *plugin_inp;
00082         delete plugin_inp;
00083         thread_no = plugin_p->get_thread_id();
00084         fwork->plugin_read_conf_file(plugin_p,thread_no);
00085         plugin_init_state = 1;
00086            clnt_sock = (SOCKET) plugin_p->get_client_socket();
00087         iResult = plugin_p->plugin_init(thread_no);
00088         if(iResult == 0)
00089             plugin_init_state = 0;
00090         struct timeval timeout;
00091         // This function gets called after client makes a 'connect' request to framework
00092         // Loop to read data from one client. One thread -> 1 client
00093         while(1)
00094         {
00095             FD_ZERO(&socks);
00096             FD_SET (clnt_sock, &socks);
00097             nfds = clnt_sock;
00098             timeout.tv_sec = fwork->timeout_seconds;
00099             timeout.tv_usec = 0;
00100             iResult = select((int)nfds+1, &socks, NULL, NULL, &timeout);
00101             if (iResult <= 0) // client did not send any requests within TIMEOUT interval. 
00102                 throw (char *)"97 Thread timeout.";
00103             else if (iResult > 0 && FD_ISSET (clnt_sock, &socks))
00104             {
00105                 if(!process_client_req(clnt_sock,plugin_init_state,plugin_p,thread_no,fwork))
00106                        throw 0;
00107             }
00108             else 
00109                 throw (char *)"98 client disconnect.";
00110         }
00111     }
00112     catch(int i)
00113     {
00114         terminate_client_session(clnt_sock,fwork,plugin_p,thread_no,(unsigned char *)"00 Terminating.");
00115     }
00116     catch(char *cp)
00117     {
00118         if(cp != 0)
00119             terminate_client_session(clnt_sock,fwork,plugin_p,thread_no,(unsigned char *)cp);
00120         }
00121 #ifdef LINUX
00122     return(NULL);
00123 #else
00124     return(0);
00125 #endif
00126 }
00127 /*********************************************************************************************/
00128 
00129 #ifdef LINUX
00130 void  *ssl_thread_fn(void *inp_arg)
00131 #else
00132 unsigned _stdcall ssl_thread_fn(void *inp_arg)
00133 #endif
00134 {
00135     int thread_no,plugin_init_state;
00136     signed int status;
00137     GENERIC_PLUGIN *plugin_p,*plugin_inp;
00138     SOCKET clnt_sock,nfds;
00139     fd_set socks;
00140     SSL *ssl;
00141     ostringstream oss;
00142     generic_server *fwork = generic_server::pinstance;
00143     fwork->rel_thread_sync_mutex();
00144     try
00145     {
00146         plugin_inp = dynamic_cast<GENERIC_PLUGIN *>((GENERIC_PLUGIN *)inp_arg);
00147         plugin_p = (fwork->factory[plugin_inp->get_plugin()])();
00148         *plugin_p = *plugin_inp;
00149         delete plugin_inp;    
00150         ssl = SSL_new(fwork->sslserver.get_ctx());
00151         thread_no = plugin_p->get_thread_id();
00152         fwork->plugin_read_conf_file(plugin_p,thread_no);
00153         plugin_init_state = 1;
00154         clnt_sock = (SOCKET) plugin_p->get_client_socket();
00155         status = SSL_set_fd(ssl, clnt_sock);
00156         if(status == 0)
00157             throw (char *) "86 SSL_set_fd failed.";
00158         if(fwork->get_verify_client())
00159             SSL_set_verify(ssl,SSL_VERIFY_PEER,NULL);
00160         status = fwork->ssl_async_accept((SSL *)ssl);
00161         if(status == 0)
00162             throw (char *) "87 SSL_accept failed.";
00163         status = plugin_p->plugin_init(thread_no);
00164         if(status == 0)
00165             plugin_init_state = 0;
00166         struct timeval timeout;
00167         // This function gets called after client makes a 'connect' request to framework
00168         // Loop to read data from one client. One thread -> 1 client
00169         while(1)
00170         {
00171             FD_ZERO(&socks);
00172             FD_SET(clnt_sock, &socks);
00173             nfds = clnt_sock;
00174             timeout.tv_sec = fwork->timeout_seconds;
00175             timeout.tv_usec = 0;
00176             status = select((int)nfds+1, &socks, NULL, NULL, &timeout);
00177             if (status <= 0) // client did not send any requests within TIMEOUT interval. 
00178                 throw 1;
00179             else if (status > 0 && FD_ISSET (clnt_sock, &socks))
00180             {
00181                 if(!process_ssl_client_req(clnt_sock,ssl,plugin_init_state,plugin_p,thread_no,fwork))
00182                     throw 0;
00183             }
00184             else
00185                 throw (char *)"89 client disconnect.";
00186         }
00187     }
00188     catch(int err)
00189     {
00190                 if(err == 1)
00191                         terminate_ssl_client_session(ssl,fwork,plugin_p,thread_no,(unsigned char *)"88 Thread timeout.");
00192                 if(err == 0)
00193                         terminate_ssl_client_session(ssl,fwork,plugin_p,thread_no,(unsigned char *)"00 Terminating.");
00194     }
00195     catch(char *cp)
00196     {
00197         if(cp != 0)
00198             terminate_ssl_client_session(ssl,fwork,plugin_p,thread_no,(unsigned char *)cp);
00199         }
00200 #ifdef LINUX
00201         return(NULL);
00202 #else
00203     return(0);
00204 #endif
00205 }
00206 /*********************************************************************************************/
00207 
00208 static int process_ssl_client_req(SOCKET clnt_sock,SSL *ssl,int plugin_init_state,
00209                                   GENERIC_PLUGIN *plugin_p,int thread_no,generic_server *fwork)
00210 {
00211 unsigned int size,result;
00212 char recvbuf[MAX_SZ];
00213 int len,offset,ssl_response;
00214 string plugin_name;
00215 unsigned char sendbuf[MAX_SZ];
00216 ostringstream os;
00217 
00218     memset(sendbuf,0,MAX_SZ);
00219     memset(recvbuf,0,MAX_SZ);
00220         size = 0;
00221         offset = 0;     
00222     try
00223     {
00224         if(plugin_init_state == 0)  
00225             throw (char *)" 88 Can't inititalize plug-in.";
00226         len = recv(SSL_get_fd(ssl), (char*) recvbuf, MAX_SZ, MSG_PEEK);
00227         if(len <= 0)
00228             throw (char *)" 89 client disconnected.";
00229                 // MESSAGE HEADER:
00230                 // SIGNATURE        - 4 bytes SIGNATURE for all messages
00231                 // PAYLOAD_SIZE     - 4 bytes network byte order 
00232                 // DATA             - PAYLOAD_SIZE data
00233                 // Data payload:
00234                 // PLUGIN_NAME_LEN  - 4 bytes network byte order (optional)
00235                 // PLUGIN_NAME      - Size as defined by <PLUGIN_NAME_LEN> (optional)
00236                 // APPLICATION_DATA - PAYLOAD_SIZE-([4+PLUGIN_NAME_LEN])
00237                 len = fwork->ssl_async_read((SSL *)ssl, recvbuf, 8);    // Remove SIGNATURE+PAYLOAD_SIZE
00238                 if(len < 0)      
00239                 throw (char *)" 90 Invalid data received from client.";
00240                         if(len == 0)
00241                                 return(0);
00242                 // check SIGNATURE and get PAYLOAD_SIZE                         
00243                 // size is the size_of_data sent by client, this should
00244                 // exclude SIGNATURE
00245                 size = get_data_size((unsigned char *)recvbuf);
00246                 if(size > (unsigned int) MAX_SZ-offset || size == 0)
00247                         throw 2;
00248                 len = fwork->ssl_async_read((SSL *)ssl, recvbuf, size);
00249                 if(len < 0)      
00250                         throw (char *)" 90 Invalid data received from client.";
00251                 if(len == 0)
00252                         return(0);
00253                 if(plugin_p->get_validate_plugin())
00254                 {
00255                         offset = 4;     // Remove plugin_name_len
00256                         plugin_name = get_input_plugin_name(recvbuf);
00257                         offset += plugin_name.length(); // Remove plugin_name 
00258                         if(plugin_name != plugin_p->get_plugin_name())
00259                         {
00260                                 if(!plugin_p->find_plugin_alias(plugin_name))
00261                                         throw 1;
00262                                 // Moving primary device name to alias list for this session..
00263                                 plugin_p->add_plugin_alias(plugin_p->get_plugin_name());
00264                                 // setting alias name as primary Plugin for this thread..
00265                                 plugin_p->set_plugin_name(plugin_name);                 
00266                         }
00267                 }
00268                 size -= offset;
00269                 result = plugin_p->process_request(recvbuf+offset,sendbuf,size);
00270                 if(result == TERMINATE_SESSION)
00271                         throw 3;
00272                 add_size(sendbuf,size);
00273                 ssl_response = fwork->ssl_async_write((SSL *)ssl, (char *)sendbuf, size+8);
00274                 if(ssl_response < 0)
00275                         throw (char *)" 93 SSL_write error.";
00276                 if(ssl_response == 0)
00277                         throw 3;
00278                 if(!print_source_hostname(clnt_sock,TLS_REQ,fwork,thread_no,plugin_p))
00279                         return(0);
00280      }
00281      catch(char *cp)
00282      {
00283                 os  << " Thr.ID:" <<  thread_no << " Plugin:" <<  plugin_p->get_plugin_name() << cp;
00284                 fwork->log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00285         return 0;
00286      }
00287          catch(int err)
00288          {
00289                  switch(err)
00290                  {
00291                         case 1:
00292                                 strcpy((char *)sendbuf,"92 Invalid plugin_name sent by client.");
00293                         case 2:
00294                                 strcpy((char *)sendbuf,"91 Invalid message.");
00295                         case 3:
00296                                 strcpy((char *)sendbuf,"00 Terminating..");
00297                  }
00298                  size = strlen((char *)sendbuf);
00299                  add_size(sendbuf,size);
00300                  fwork->ssl_async_write((SSL *)ssl, (char *)sendbuf, size+8);
00301                  return(0);
00302          }
00303          return(1);
00304 }
00305 /*******************************************************************************************/
00306 
00307 int print_source_hostname(int clnt_sock,int req_type,generic_server *fwork,int thread_no,GENERIC_PLUGIN *plugin_p)
00308 {
00309     struct sockaddr_storage peer;
00310     struct sockaddr_in *s;
00311     int peer_len;
00312     ostringstream os;
00313 
00314     peer_len = sizeof(sockaddr_storage);
00315     if( (getpeername(clnt_sock, (sockaddr *)&peer,(socklen_t*) &peer_len)) != SOCKET_ERROR)
00316     {
00317         s = (sockaddr_in *) &peer;
00318         os  <<" Thr.ID:" <<  thread_no << " Plugin:" <<  plugin_p->get_plugin_name() << " Request from: ";
00319         os  << inet_ntoa(s->sin_addr);
00320     }
00321     fwork->log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00322     return(1);
00323 }
00324 /*******************************************************************************************/
00325 
00326 static int process_client_req(SOCKET clnt_sock,int plugin_init_state,GENERIC_PLUGIN *plugin_p,int thread_no,generic_server *fwork)
00327 {
00328 unsigned int size,result;
00329 char recvbuf[MAX_SZ];
00330 int len,offset;
00331 bool first;
00332 string plugin_name;
00333 unsigned char sendbuf[MAX_SZ];
00334 ostringstream  os;
00335     memset(sendbuf,0,MAX_SZ);
00336     memset(recvbuf,0,MAX_SZ);
00337         offset = 0;
00338     try
00339     {
00340         if(plugin_init_state == 0)  
00341             throw (char *)" 88 Can't inititalize plug-in.";
00342         len = recv(clnt_sock, (char*) recvbuf, MAX_SZ, MSG_PEEK);
00343         if(len <= 0)
00344                         throw (char *)" 89 client disconnected.";
00345                 len = read_socket((unsigned char*) recvbuf,clnt_sock, 8);
00346                 if(len <= 0)
00347                         throw (char *)" 90 1 Invalid data received from client.";
00348                 // MESSAGE HEADER:
00349                 // SIGNATURE        - 4 bytes SIGNATURE for all messages
00350                 // PAYLOAD_SIZE     - 4 bytes network byte order 
00351                 // DATA             - PAYLOAD_SIZE data
00352                 // Data payload:
00353                 // PLUGIN_NAME_LEN  - 4 bytes network byte order (optional)
00354                 // PLUGIN_NAME      - Size as defined by <PLUGIN_NAME_LEN> (optional)
00355                 // APPLICATION_DATA - PAYLOAD_SIZE-([4+PLUGIN_NAME_LEN])
00356 
00357                 // check SIGNATURE and get PAYLOAD_SIZE                         
00358                 // size is the size_of_data sent by client, this should
00359                 // exclude SIGNATURE
00360                 size = get_data_size((unsigned char *)recvbuf);
00361                 if(size > (unsigned int) MAX_SZ-offset || size == 0)
00362                         throw 2;
00363                 len = read_socket((unsigned char*) recvbuf,clnt_sock, size);
00364                 if(len <= 0)
00365                         throw (char *)" 90 2 Invalid data received from client.";
00366                 if(plugin_p->get_validate_plugin())
00367                 {
00368                         offset = 4;     // Remove plugin_name_len
00369                         plugin_name = get_input_plugin_name(recvbuf);
00370                         offset += plugin_name.length(); // Remove plugin_name 
00371                         if(plugin_name != plugin_p->get_plugin_name())
00372                         {
00373                                 if(!plugin_p->find_plugin_alias(plugin_name))
00374                                         throw 1;
00375                                 // Moving primary device name to alias list for this session..
00376                                 plugin_p->add_plugin_alias(plugin_p->get_plugin_name());
00377                                 // setting alias name as primary Plugin for this thread..
00378                                 plugin_p->set_plugin_name(plugin_name);                 
00379                         }
00380                 }
00381                 size -= offset;
00382                 result = plugin_p->process_request(recvbuf+offset,sendbuf,size);
00383                 if(result == TERMINATE_SESSION)
00384                         throw 3;
00385                 add_size(sendbuf,size);
00386                 result = send(clnt_sock, (char *)sendbuf,size+8,0);
00387                 if(result <= 0)
00388                         throw (char *) " 00 Terminating..";
00389         if(!print_source_hostname(clnt_sock,SOCKET_REQ,fwork,thread_no,plugin_p))
00390             return(0);
00391      }
00392      catch(char *cp)
00393      {
00394                 os  << " Thr.ID:" <<  thread_no << " Plugin:" <<  plugin_p->get_plugin_name() << cp;
00395                 fwork->log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00396         return(0);
00397      }
00398          catch(int err)
00399          {
00400                  switch(err)
00401                  {
00402                         case 1:
00403                                 strcpy((char *)sendbuf,"92 Invalid plugin_name sent by client.");
00404                         case 2:
00405                                 strcpy((char *)sendbuf,"91 Invalid message.");
00406                  }
00407                  size = strlen((char *)sendbuf);
00408                  add_size(sendbuf,size);
00409                  send(clnt_sock, (char *)sendbuf,size+8,0);
00410                  return(0);
00411          }
00412          return(1);
00413 }
00414 /*******************************************************************************************/
00415 
00416 int terminate_client_session(SOCKET clnt_sock,generic_server *fwork, GENERIC_PLUGIN *plugin_p,int thread_no,unsigned char *sendbuf)
00417 {
00418     int len;
00419     ostringstream os;
00420 
00421     len = strlen((char *)sendbuf);
00422     send(clnt_sock, (char *)sendbuf, (int)len, 0 );
00423     plugin_p->shutdown_plugin(); // Aborting SESSION..
00424     os.str("");
00425     os.clear();
00426     os  << " Thr.ID:" << thread_no << " Plugin:" << plugin_p->get_plugin_name() << " Quitting thread." << sendbuf;
00427     fwork->log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00428         fwork->socket_close(clnt_sock);
00429     delete plugin_p;
00430     fwork->rel_thread_id(thread_no);
00431     return(1);
00432 }
00433 /*********************************************************************************************/
00434 
00435 int terminate_ssl_client_session(SSL *ssl,generic_server *fwork, GENERIC_PLUGIN *plugin_p,int thread_no,unsigned char *sendbuf)
00436 {
00437         int len,ssl_response,status;
00438         ostringstream os;
00439         char buf[100];
00440 
00441     len = strlen((char *)sendbuf);
00442         status = recv(SSL_get_fd(ssl), (char*) buf, 10, MSG_PEEK);
00443     if(status > 0)
00444         {
00445                 ssl_response = fwork->ssl_async_write((SSL *)ssl,  (char *)sendbuf, (int)len);
00446                 if(ssl_response > 0)
00447                 {
00448                         while((SSL_shutdown(ssl)) == 0)
00449                         ;
00450                 }
00451         }
00452     plugin_p->shutdown_plugin(); 
00453     os  << " Thr.ID:" << thread_no << " ChipID:" << plugin_p->get_plugin_name() << " Quitting thread." << sendbuf;
00454     fwork->log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,os.str());
00455         fwork->socket_close(SSL_get_fd(ssl));
00456         SSL_free((SSL *)ssl);
00457         ERR_free_strings();
00458         ERR_remove_state(0);
00459     delete plugin_p;
00460     fwork->rel_thread_id(thread_no);
00461     return(1);
00462 }
00463 /*******************************************************************************************/
00464 
00465 #ifdef LINUX
00466 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) 
00467 #else
00468 VOID start_service(LPSTR* argv)
00469 #endif
00470 {
00471     char pname[100],daemon_flag,cfile[MAX_SZ];
00472     generic_server *framework = generic_server::instance();
00473     ostringstream os;
00474     daemon_flag = 0;
00475     memset(cfile,0,MAX_SZ);
00476 #ifdef LINUX
00477     if(argc < 3)
00478     {
00479         cout << "Usage: generic_server.exe <generic_server_name> <conf file>" << endl;
00480         exit(-1);
00481     }
00482     strncpy(cfile,argv[2],strlen(argv[2]));
00483     if(argc == 4)
00484         daemon_flag = atoi(argv[3]);
00485     strcpy(pname,argv[1]);
00486     for(int i = 0;i < argc; i++)
00487         memset(argv[i],' ',strlen(argv[i]));
00488     strcpy(argv[0],pname);
00489     prctl(PR_SET_NAME,(unsigned long)pname,0,0,0);
00490 #else
00491     string tmp;
00492     istringstream iss(GetCommandLine());
00493     iss >> tmp;
00494     iss >> tmp;
00495     if(!tmp.empty())
00496         strcpy(cfile,(char *)tmp.c_str());
00497     else
00498         strcpy(cfile,(char *)"C:\\generic_server\\generic_server.conf");
00499     strcpy(pname,argv[0]);
00500 #endif
00501     framework->set_conf_file(cfile);
00502     framework->set_process_name(pname);
00503     if(!framework->init())
00504     {
00505         framework->log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,(char *)" FATAL error. Please check for configuration errors!.");
00506         exit(-1);
00507     }
00508 #ifdef LINUX
00509     if(!daemon_flag)
00510         daemonize();
00511 #else
00512     SetConsoleCtrlHandler( (PHANDLER_ROUTINE) CtrlHandler, TRUE);
00513 #endif
00514     framework->print_key_message();
00515     // Enter infinite loop and dispatch callbacks
00516     process_data();
00517 }
00518 /*******************************************************************************************/
00519 #ifndef WINDOWS
00520 void daemonize()
00521 {
00522     int i,lfp;
00523     char str[10];
00524 
00525     if(getppid()==1)
00526         return;                       /* already a daemon                   */
00527     i=fork();
00528     if (i < 0)
00529     {
00530         cerr << "Unable to fork()..." << endl;
00531         exit(1);                      /* can not open                       */
00532     }
00533     if (i > 0)
00534         exit(0);                      /* parent exits                       */
00535                                       /* child (daemon) continues           */
00536     setsid();                         /* obtain a new process group         */
00537     umask(022);                       /* set newly created file permissions */
00538     signal(SIGCHLD,SIG_IGN);          /* ignore child                       */
00539     signal(SIGTSTP,SIG_IGN);          /* ignore tty signals                 */
00540     signal(SIGTTOU,SIG_IGN);
00541     signal(SIGTTIN,SIG_IGN);
00542     signal(SIGPIPE,SIG_IGN);
00543     signal(SIGHUP,do_nothing);        /* catch hangup signal                */
00544     signal(SIGTERM,sig_int);          /* catch kill signal                  */
00545 }
00546 /*****************************************************************************************/
00547 #else
00548 BOOL WINAPI DllMain(
00549     HINSTANCE hinstDLL, // handle to DLL module
00550     DWORD fdwReason,    // reason for calling function
00551     LPVOID lpReserved)  // reserved
00552 {
00553     // Perform actions based on the reason for calling.
00554     switch(fdwReason) 
00555     { 
00556         case DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH:
00557          // Initialize once for each new process.
00558          // Return FALSE to fail DLL load.
00559             break;
00560 
00561         case DLL_THREAD_ATTACH:
00562          // Do thread-specific initialization.
00563             break;
00564 
00565         case DLL_THREAD_DETACH:
00566          //sig_int(0);    
00567          // Do thread-specific cleanup.
00568             break;
00569 
00570         case DLL_PROCESS_DETACH:
00571         //sig_int(0);        // Perform any necessary cleanup.
00572             break;
00573     }
00574     return TRUE;  // Successful DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH.
00575 }
00576 /*****************************************************************************************/
00577 #endif
00578 
00579 void sig_int(int sig_num)
00580 {
00581     generic_server *framework = generic_server::pinstance;
00582     vector <GENERIC_PLUGIN *>::iterator it;
00583     ostringstream os;
00584 
00585     os  << " Thr.ID:MAIN thread. Signal received to terminate.. " << endl;
00586     for(it = framework->get_start_iterator(); it != framework->get_end_iterator();it++)
00587     {
00588                 map<string,bool>::iterator bootstrap_itr = framework->bootstrap_jobs.find((*it)->bootstrap_name());
00589                 // Cleanup bootstrapped stuff..
00590                 if(bootstrap_itr != framework->bootstrap_jobs.end() && (*it)->bootstrap_name() != "")
00591                 {
00592                         os  << "\tThr.ID:MAIN. Invoking bootstrap terminate: " << (*it)->bootstrap_name() << " on plug-in: " << (*it)->get_plugin_name() << endl;
00593                         if(!(*it)->bootstrap_terminate((*it)->bootstrap_name()))
00594                         {
00595                                 os  << "\tThr.ID:MAIN failed to terminate bootstrap: " << (*it)->bootstrap_name() << " on plug-in: " << (*it)->get_plugin_name() << endl;
00596                         }
00597                         framework->bootstrap_jobs.erase(bootstrap_itr);
00598                 }
00599                 if( (framework->check_enabled_plugin((*it)->get_plugin())) > 1)
00600                         it = framework->v.erase(it);
00601                 else
00602                 {
00603                         os << "\tShutting down: " << *(*it) << endl;
00604                         (*it)->server_shutdown();
00605                         it = framework->v.erase(it);
00606                 }
00607     }
00608     framework->log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,(char *)os.str().c_str());
00609     framework->close_log();
00610     exit(0);
00611 }
00612 /*****************************************************************************************/
00613 
00614 int process_data(void)
00615 {
00616     SOCKET command_sock;
00617     fd_set socks;
00618     size_t readsock;
00619     unsigned int nfds;
00620     generic_server *fwork = generic_server::pinstance;
00621         struct timeval timeout;
00622 
00623         timeout.tv_sec = 0;
00624         timeout.tv_usec = 20;
00625         command_sock = fwork->create_socket(fwork->get_command_port());
00626         if(command_sock == 0)
00627                 return(0);
00628     while(1)
00629     {
00630                 nfds = 0;
00631         FD_ZERO(&socks);
00632         nfds = init_sock_fds(&socks,command_sock);
00633         readsock = select(nfds+1,&socks,NULL,NULL,0);
00634         if(errno == EINTR)
00635         {
00636             fwork->reload_conf_file();
00637             continue;
00638         }
00639         if(readsock <= 0)
00640             continue;
00641         if(chk_command_sock(&socks,command_sock))
00642             continue;
00643         chk_all_clients(&socks);
00644         if(!fwork->syslog_flag)
00645             fwork->rollover_logs();
00646     }
00647 }
00648 /*****************************************************************************************/
00649 
00650 unsigned int init_sock_fds(fd_set *socks,SOCKET command_sock)
00651 {
00652     unsigned int nfds;
00653     generic_server *fwork = generic_server::pinstance;
00654     nfds = 0;
00655     for(fwork->itr = fwork->v.begin(); fwork->itr != fwork->v.end(); ++fwork->itr)
00656     {
00657         if(nfds < (*fwork->itr)->get_socket())
00658             nfds =  (unsigned int)(*fwork->itr)->get_socket();
00659         FD_SET((*fwork->itr)->get_socket(),socks);
00660     }
00661     FD_SET(command_sock,socks);
00662     return(nfds);
00663 }
00664 /*****************************************************************************************/
00665 
00666 int chk_command_sock(fd_set *socks,SOCKET command_sock)
00667 {
00668     generic_server *fwork = generic_server::pinstance;
00669     SOCKET clnt_sock;
00670 
00671     if(FD_ISSET(command_sock,socks))
00672     {
00673         clnt_sock = accept(command_sock,NULL,NULL);
00674         if(clnt_sock < 0)
00675             return(0);
00676         shutdown(clnt_sock,2);
00677 #ifdef WINDOWS
00678         closesocket(clnt_sock);
00679 #else
00680         close(clnt_sock);
00681 #endif
00682         fwork->reload_conf_file();
00683         return(1);
00684     }
00685     return(0);
00686 }
00687 /*****************************************************************************************/
00688 
00689 int launch_thread(GENERIC_PLUGIN *generic_plugin,unsigned int new_slot)
00690 {
00691     generic_server *fwork = generic_server::pinstance;
00692 #ifdef LINUX
00693         pthread_attr_t attr; // thread attribute
00694                                                  // set thread detachstate attribute to DETACHED 
00695     fwork->get_thread_sync_mutex();
00696     pthread_attr_init(&attr);
00697     pthread_attr_setdetachstate(&attr, PTHREAD_CREATE_DETACHED);
00698 #endif
00699     if(generic_plugin->get_tls_flag())
00700     {
00701 #ifdef WINDOWS
00702         fwork->get_thread_sync_mutex();
00703                 fwork->thread_ids[new_slot].th = (HANDLE)_beginthreadex(NULL, 0, &ssl_thread_fn, (void *)generic_plugin, 0, NULL );
00704 #else
00705         pthread_create(&fwork->thread_ids[new_slot].th,&attr,ssl_thread_fn, (void *)generic_plugin);
00706 #endif
00707     }
00708     else
00709     {
00710 #ifdef WINDOWS
00711         fwork->get_thread_sync_mutex();
00712                 fwork->thread_ids[new_slot].th = (HANDLE)_beginthreadex(NULL, 0, &thread_fn, (void *)generic_plugin, 0, NULL );
00713 #else
00714         pthread_create(&fwork->thread_ids[new_slot].th,&attr,thread_fn, (void *)generic_plugin);
00715 #endif
00716     }
00717 #ifdef LINUX
00718     pthread_attr_destroy(&attr);
00719 #endif
00720     fwork->close_thread_ids();
00721     return(1);
00722 }
00723 /*****************************************************************************************/
00724 
00725 int chk_all_clients(fd_set *socks)
00726 {
00727     generic_server *fwork = generic_server::pinstance;
00728     SOCKET clnt_sock;
00729     unsigned int len,new_slot;
00730     GENERIC_PLUGIN *generic_plugin;
00731     char sendbuf[MAX_SZ];
00732 
00733     memset(sendbuf,0,MAX_SZ);
00734     for(fwork->itr = fwork->v.begin(); fwork->itr != fwork->v.end(); ++fwork->itr)
00735     {
00736         if(FD_ISSET((*fwork->itr)->get_socket(),socks))
00737         {
00738             clnt_sock = accept((*fwork->itr)->get_socket(),NULL,NULL);
00739             if(clnt_sock < 0)
00740                 continue;
00741             fwork->setnonblocking(clnt_sock);
00742             len = recv(clnt_sock, (char*) sendbuf, 10, MSG_PEEK);
00743             if(len <= 0)
00744             {
00745                 shutdown(clnt_sock,2);
00746                 fwork->log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,(char *)"85 client disconnected.");
00747                 continue;
00748             }
00749             if(fwork->thread_ids.size() >= (unsigned int) fwork->max_threads)
00750             {
00751                 fwork->log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,(char *)"11 Too many threads running. Try later..");
00752                 shutdown(clnt_sock,2);
00753 #ifdef WINDOWS
00754                 closesocket(clnt_sock);
00755 #else
00756                 close(clnt_sock);
00757 #endif
00758             }
00759             else
00760             {
00761                                 fwork->close_thread_ids();
00762                 generic_plugin = new GENERIC_PLUGIN;
00763                 *generic_plugin = (GENERIC_PLUGIN) *(*fwork->itr);
00764                 generic_plugin->set_client_socket(clnt_sock);
00765                 new_slot = fwork->get_thread_id();
00766                 generic_plugin->set_thread_id(new_slot);
00767                 launch_thread(generic_plugin,new_slot);
00768             }
00769         }
00770     }
00771     return(1);
00772 }
00773 /*****************************************************************************************/
00774 #ifdef WINDOWS
00775 BOOL CtrlHandler( DWORD fdwCtrlType ) 
00776 { 
00777   switch( fdwCtrlType ) 
00778   { 
00779     // Handle the CTRL-C signal. 
00780     case CTRL_C_EVENT: 
00781         sig_int(fdwCtrlType);
00782         return(TRUE);
00783     case CTRL_BREAK_EVENT: 
00784         return(TRUE);
00785     default: 
00786       return FALSE; 
00787   } 
00788 }
00789 /*****************************************************************************************/
00790 #endif
00791 
00792 void do_nothing(int sig_num)
00793 {
00794 }
00795 /*********************************************************************************************/
00796 
00797 unsigned int get_data_size(unsigned char *recvbuf)
00798 {
00799         unsigned int size,plugin_signature;
00800 
00801         plugin_signature = htonl(PLUGIN_SIGNATURE);
00802         // check for PLUGIN_SIGNATURE
00803         if(memcmp(recvbuf,(char *)&plugin_signature,4))
00804                 return(0);
00805         memcpy(&size,recvbuf+4,4);
00806         size = ntohl(size);
00807         return(size);
00808 }
00809 /*******************************************************************************************/
00810 
00811 int add_size(unsigned char *recvbuf,unsigned int size)
00812 {
00813         int sav_size;
00814         unsigned int plugin_signature;
00815         char buffer[MAX_SZ+8];
00816 
00817         plugin_signature = htonl(PLUGIN_SIGNATURE);
00818         sav_size = size;
00819         size = htonl(size);
00820         memcpy(buffer,(char *)&plugin_signature,4);
00821         memcpy(buffer+4,&size,4);
00822         memcpy(buffer+8,recvbuf,sav_size);
00823         memcpy(recvbuf,buffer,sav_size+8);
00824         return(1);
00825 }
00826 /*******************************************************************************************/
00827 
00828 string get_input_plugin_name(char *buffer)
00829 {
00830         string plugin_name;
00831         unsigned int size;
00832 
00833         memcpy((char *)&size,buffer,4);
00834         size = ntohl(size);
00835         plugin_name = string(buffer+4,size);
00836         return(plugin_name);
00837 }
00838 /*******************************************************************************************/
00839 
00840 static int read_socket(unsigned char *buffer,SOCKET sock,int size)
00841 {
00842     fd_set socks;
00843     struct timeval timeout;
00844     char str[MAX_SZ];
00845     size_t readsock;
00846     int t,bytes_recvd;
00847     bytes_recvd = 0;
00848 
00849     memset(buffer,0,sizeof(buffer));
00850     memset(str,0,MAX_SZ);
00851     while(bytes_recvd < size)
00852     {
00853                 FD_ZERO(&socks);
00854                 FD_SET(sock,&socks);
00855                 timeout.tv_sec = 2;
00856                 timeout.tv_usec = 0;
00857                 readsock = select((int)sock+1,&socks,NULL,NULL,&timeout);
00858                 if(readsock <= 0)
00859                 return(0);
00860                 if(FD_ISSET(sock,&socks))
00861                 {
00862                         t = recv(sock,str,size, 0);
00863                 if(t > 0)
00864                         {
00865                 memcpy(buffer+bytes_recvd,str,t);
00866                 bytes_recvd += t;
00867                 if(bytes_recvd >= size)
00868                         break;
00869                         }
00870                 }
00871         }
00872         return(bytes_recvd);
00873 }
